column1: Art Institute of Chicago////If you're a student
column2: don't forget your student ID at home like I did. Save a few bucks. The highlights of the Art Institute for me were the Impressionists and the Thorne miniature rooms. Going on Black Friday will be a terrible idea if you hate crowds. There are two entrances
column3: one of which is used less than the other. Be sure to pace yourself. You can leave and come back
column4: which is nice if you don't feel like paying for overpriced museum refreshments.
